channel.title: MySQL info
channel.description:
My MySQL info is this;
[code]MySQL user xth_6959279 MySQL password hscores MySQL host sql205.xtreemhost.com MySQL port 3306 MySQL db highscores[/code]
Then what am I supposed to insert for this line? (SQL.java) [code]con = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://sql205.xtreemhost.com/highscores","xth_6959279","hscores");[/code]
I tried the line above ^, but it doesn't seem to work.
